org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.admin.rdebug.server
Class AeRemoteDebugImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.admin.rdebug.server.AeRemoteDebugImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBpelAdmin, java.rmi.Remote
public class AeRemoteDebugImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeBpelAdmin

Remote implementation of the BPEL Engine used by Web Service invocation.

Nested Class Summary
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeBreakpointListener
          This is the global process listener stub which will forward breakpoint events to the remote event handler.
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeEngineListener
          The engine listener implementation which will forward events to the remote event handler.
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeProcessListener
          The process listener stub which will forward events to the remote event handler.
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeRemoteResumeObjectWork
          Scheduled work for resuming an object in a process.
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeRemoteResumeWork
          Scheduled work for resuming a process.
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeRemoteSuspendWork
          Scheduled work for suspending a process.
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeRemoteTerminateWork
          Scheduled work for terminating a process.
protected static class AeRemoteDebugImpl.AeRemoteWork
          Base class for our work involving calls into the engine that affect a process.

Method Detail

getConfiguration

public java.lang.String getConfiguration()
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                         AeException
Description copied from interface: IAeBpelAdmin
Gets the current engine configuration as xml. This is intended to be used as a debugging and testing tool. The structure of the xml is subject to change without notice so don't rely on it to be consistent across versions. Finer grain access to configuration properties may be forthcoming in another part of the api.

Specified by:
getConfiguration in interface IAeBpelAdmin
Returns:
xml string representing the engine config
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
AeException
See Also:
IAeBpelAdmin.getConfiguration()

Setter for the engine config. Accepts an xml string that will be parsed into a configuration object and update the current engine config. Note: this string must contain ALL of the config properties.

suspendProcess

public void suspendProcess(long aPid)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                           AeBusinessProcessException
Note this implementation will schhedule the suspend and wait up to 30 seconds for the suspend to actually happen, this avoid deadlocks under rare occasions. But under normal circumstances the call will appear synchronous to client.

Specified by:
suspendProcess in interface IAeBpelAdmin
Parameters:
aPid - The process id of the process to suspend.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
java.rmi.RemoteException
See Also:

Returns the key to use for locating listeners given the contextId and endpoint URL.

Parameters:
aContextId - The context id
aEndpointURL - The URL of the administrative web service
